public ref class Queryable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组用于查询实现 的数据结构的 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）方法。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一组的方法中声明查询数据源实现类为提供的标准查询运算符实现。The set of methods declared in the class provides an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 标准查询运算符是常规用途方法，它们遵循[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，可用于任何中的数据中表示遍历、 筛选和投影操作。基于 NET 的编程语言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 大多数此类中的方法被定义为扩展的扩展方法类型。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the type. 这意味着它们可以调用类似于实例方法实现的任何对象。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 将扩展这些方法不执行任何查询直接。These methods that extend do not perform any querying directly. 相反，它们的功能是构建对象，它是一个表示累积查询的表达式树。Instead, their functionality is to build an object, which is an expression tree that represents the cumulative query. 方法然后传递到新的表达式树方法或方法的输入。The methods then pass the new expression tree to either the method or the method of the input . 调用的方法取决于是否方法返回单一实例值，在这种情况下调用时，或在这种情况下会产生可枚举的结果，调用。The method that is called depends on whether the method returns a singleton value, in which case is called, or has enumerable results, in which case is called. 通过实现的类执行针对目标数据的实际查询执行。The actual query execution on the target data is performed by a class that implements . 任何的假定条件下实现是执行通过已构造的表达式树的结果标准查询运算符方法相当于调用相应方法的结果类中，如果数据源是。The expectation of any implementation is that the result of executing an expression tree that was constructed by a standard query operator method is equivalent to the result of calling the corresponding method in the class, if the data source were an . 除了标准查询运算符方法作用于的对象，此类还包含一种方法， ，哪些类型对象作为对象。In addition to the standard query operator methods that operate on objects, this class also contains a method, , which types objects as objects.

span.span: Language-Integrated Query (LINQ)
Standard Query Operators Overview
Expression Trees
LINQ to SQL

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有至少一个类型参数其类型参数是之一类型。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 为这些参数可以传递 lambda 表达式中，它将编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法将生成，表示调用本身作为一个构造泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后将其传递到方法由此属性`source`参数。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 由于执行表达式树表示调用而发生的查询行为取决于实现的类型`source`参数。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 预期的行为是指定的函数， `func`，应用中的源序列，并累积每个值，则返回值。The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned. 中的第一个值`source`用作与中的第一个参数相对应的累计值的种子值`func`。The first value in `source` is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`. 若要简化常见的聚合操作，标准查询运算符的组，还包括两种计数的方法，并，以及四个数字的聚合方法，即， ， ，和.To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, and , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用生成一个字符串数组中的某个句子。The following code example demonstrates how to use to build a sentence from an array of strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类型`source`实现，直接返回。If the type of `source` implements , returns it directly. 否则，它将返回用于执行查询的调用中的运算符方法的等效查询而不是在。Otherwise, it returns an that executes queries by calling the equivalent query operator methods in instead of those in . 此方法假设`source`实现某些`T`。This method assumes that `source` implements for some `T`. 在运行时，结果为类型针对同一个`T`。At runtime, the result is of type for the same `T`. 此方法可在动态情况下不以静态方式知道的类型时`T`。This method is useful in dynamic scenarios when you do not statically know the type of `T`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有至少一个类型参数其类型参数是之一类型。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 为这些参数可以传递 lambda 表达式中，它将编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法将生成，表示调用本身作为一个构造泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后将其传递到方法由此属性`outer`参数。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `outer` parameter. 由于执行表达式树表示调用而发生的查询行为取决于实现的类型`outer`参数。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter. 预期的行为是内部联接。The expected behavior is that of an inner join. `outerKeySelector`并`innerKeySelector`函数用来提取从密钥`outer`和`inner`分别。The `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively. 这些键相等来匹配每个序列中的元素进行比较。These keys are compared for equality to match elements from each sequence. 为每个元素中存储的一对元素`inner`中的元素中匹配`outer`。A pair of elements is stored for each element in `inner` that matches an element in `outer`. 然后`resultSelector`调用函数到项目中的每对匹配的元素的结果对象。Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each pair of matching elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用执行内部联接的两个序列基于一个公共键。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有至少一个类型参数其类型参数是之一类型。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 为这些参数可以传递 lambda 表达式中，它将编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法将生成，表示调用本身作为一个构造泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后将其传递到方法由此属性`source`参数。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 由于执行表达式树表示调用而发生的查询行为取决于实现的类型`source`参数。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 预期的行为是，它适用`predicate`中的所有元素`source`直到它找到一个元素为其`predicate`返回 false。The expected behavior is that it applies `predicate` to each element in `source` until it finds an element for which `predicate` returns false. 返回该元素和所有剩余元素。That element and all the remaining elements are returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要跳过数组的元素，只要条件为 true。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将生成，表示调用本身作为一个构造泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后将其传递到方法由此属性`source1`参数。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source1` parameter. 该方法将合并第一个序列与第二个序列中具有相同的索引的元素，每个的元素。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列不具有相同的元素数，方法将合并序列，直到它达到其中之一的末尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一个序列包含三个元素，并且另一个具有四个，所产生的序列必须只有三个元素。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the resulting sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来合并两个序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences.
